website_summaries.verdict: Though you don't get a lot when it comes to portion size, this gift basket is still worth gifting to those who enjoy sampling meats and cheeses.
pros: Meat and cheese lovers appreciate this gift basket that features a variety of summer sausages and cheeses made in Wisconsin
cons: On the higher end of the price scale, yet most of the items are fairly small portions
A few reports of some items tasting stale

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ingredients, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this item to my daughter as a care package since she just moved into a new apartment. The first shipment never arrived although they insisted it was sent. The second shipment had extremely poor quality meats and cheeses. They are so bad that my daughter is saving them to give to her dog. Normally she loves gift baskets so this one is a real disappointment. I normally don't take the time to leave poor reviews but this product was expensive, but clearly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allen

customer_reviews.title: Expired product!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived today 9-14-18, with a best by date of 5-20-18... so its almost 4 months expired and was supposed to be a gift. Very disappointed. What a waste of money. Wont let me return it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled and gross
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item to my husband for his birthday in April. He wouldn't eat the cheese because it had an odd texture, like powdered cheese. He opened the garlic sausage and it had gone bad. For the price I expected more and will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody B

customer_reviews.title: Slimy Cheese.
customer_reviews.text: Package well. Arrived with all the chesses melted and slimy. Hoped for better. Couldn't eat . Everything else was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Patten Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wafers were stale and other products did not have an expiration date
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Finley

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Went to my son overseas in the armed forces. He loved it..
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Easy gift. As long as they dont know what you paid.
customer_reviews.text: Blah, blah, blah. This is a lot of money for what you get. Should be twice the size. Sausage is good. Cheese and crackers are blah. I could nake this at local super market for 10 bucks. Kind of a rip off if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: elderjay

customer_reviews.title: Gift arrived already expired!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for Christmas. I called him this morning to see if he received and he said it had an expiration date of 10-9-18!!! I am absolutely horrified.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wisconsin's is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for someone else. I got great responses previous years, so I ordered it again. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stuby

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law was very pleased to have received it late after Christmas holiday. He is very picky with snacks and cheeses from gift shops and catalog orders but this he really liked. He commented on the variety offered as well.
customer_reviews.author: John A Duvenez

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. He shared it with the family and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Dad for Father's Day. He loved it. He shared it with the family and everyone thought it was really good. Everything was fresh and tasted good. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sausage tastes good, but cheese arrived hardened and doesn't taste very ...
customer_reviews.text: Sausage tastes good, but cheese arrived hardened and doesn't taste very good. Also the price is way to high for the quality of which i received. Disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: MasonMommy1230

customer_reviews.title: Meats had soft consistency...
customer_reviews.text: We expected usual consistency of sausage packaged in this manner. The meats had soft consistency. Almost like raw ground meat. Unfortunately, we ordered online so we could not return it. This is not a product we would ever purchase again and we felt like we wasted money. In the future, we will never order this type of product online. Better off purchasing Boars Head brand in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased at all
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased at all. Very disappointed. Read great reviews before ordering, basket arrived yesterday and the ,eats looked and tasted old.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Carnley

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice gift. Arrived fresh, well packaged, and on time.
customer_reviews.author: NoVaGrl

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This was given to my dad for Fathers Day and according to my mom, he had eaten it by the second day of receiving it. So I am comfortable giving this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: less than one star. cheese was moldy sausage was rotten
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

customer_reviews.title: I sent this to my dad as a gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my dad as a gift. It arrived even sooner than advertised and my dad loves it. He told me in detail about each item!
customer_reviews.author: L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: This delivered with a cut in one of the sausage that was moldy. Now i can't return it... NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: George Curbelo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for ourselves, but it would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great gift at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jmhaden

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends as a welcome home gift and they said they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so not sure what it tasted like.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: Way overpriced and the taste was not very good. The cheese over flavored. Very disappointed in this product. Gave as Christmas presents. Not again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA S

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a day early and my mom loves it
customer_reviews.author: sherri panuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality of Wisconsin Cheese and Meats!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my landlord, Neal, for Father's day. The gift arrived as expected, on time, and in great, fresh condition. Neal loved the fresh cheese and meats. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: pc1806

customer_reviews.title: Tasted diguisting
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a 0 I would. We purchased two one to ship to friends and one to our home. It was terrible. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Recipients said cheese tasted like plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Was part of a wedding gift.Recipients said the sausage was not very good and cheese was disappointing also. Expected better since it was Wisconsin cheese product
customer_reviews.author: jasper

customer_reviews.title: It made it all 8000 miles.
customer_reviews.text: It made it all 8000 miles away from home. It's all gone but it made it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: madman

customer_reviews.title: I sent this hamper to my family in Rhode Island ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this hamper to my family in Rhode Island and on the box was written it's description of contents but instead of crackers it said F..ckers!!! They were quite upset to say the least!! I have a picture to show this and can email it.
customer_reviews.author: john doherty

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a father's day gift, so I didn't taste any of it. The seller threw in a free pepper jack cheese. (I think. Could have been a different kind.) But that was a nice surprise. It's a little pricey, but it was a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my out of state father. He loved this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mann-Glover

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it was well received and appreciated. I would purchase this product again
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for my boyfriends parents and they loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This basket was ordered as a gift for my boyfriends parents and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Might try a different one next time.
customer_reviews.text: One person loved it and another not all. lol. Was sent as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Phil and Cariane Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Forced portion control?
customer_reviews.text: The entire package can fit on a single plate. Really? $55! Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Rastus

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Everything was delicious, my Dad loved it (overnighted Father's Day gift)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and a MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Got it early and I'm very happy! I love Wisconsins meat boxes they do :) Was for Easter for me but couldn't help it lol
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: They said they loved the set of goodies
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my parents. They said they loved the set of goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Lobo1727

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my son as a gift and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Blonde in CA

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift! They loved the quality and selection of meats and cheeses!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: I really expected this to be better than competitors like Hickory Farms
customer_reviews.text: I really expected this to be better than competitors like Hickory Farms. In my opinion, it wasn't. The meats were very similar tasting with just a uniform smokiness and not much else. The cheese was better but nothing more unique than your average grocery store brand. My 3 daughters, wife, and myself served this to family as an appetizer during New Years time. It was fairly unanimous to go back to Hickory Farms.
customer_reviews.author: James Mowrey

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for mothers day and she said it was delicious
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Unless you like spicey sausauge don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough variety. Two of the summer sausage were to spice for my guests.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids liked and enjoyed the gift basket with all the food in it
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Natal

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This gift basket was a great Christmas gift. My sons loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Gift Expired before it got there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I have ever written and am doing so because the expiration date on the product was 3/22/19 and the gift was just ordered on Monday April 8th. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J.  DiPaola

customer_reviews.title: are y'all going to return or replace the summer
customer_reviews.text: One of the packages was open so I'm not happy about it the smoked summer sausage is open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety, tasted good. Just wish the sausage sticks were larger.
customer_reviews.author: David M Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do love this basket and had already sent it twice to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: RBurgelli

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Was sent to friends in Kansas City, they really enjoyed the contents. Will do this again next Christmas. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda D

customer_reviews.title: Son said that everything was good.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Son said that everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to my mom in Montana and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kent & Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my step-father on Fathers Day. He loved it. I felt like it was a really nice gift. The price still seems slightly high but the food was good...So...It wasn't a bad buy at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

product_meta.title: Ultimate Gift Basket with Features Smoked Summer Sausages, 100% Wisconsin Cheese, Crackers, Pretzels and Mustard
product_meta.description:
* Wisconsin’s Best, LLC and Wisconsin Cheese Company, LLC is a privately held USA Business 

 * Our Company has been offering great Wisconsin Cheese, Sausage, and Assorted Gifts successfully through Amazon for more than 5 years, often being featured as Amazon’s Choice and Amazon Best Sellers 

 * We provide quality and value to our customers and stand behind our Company’s offerings 

 * Our selections include individual cheese, naturally smoked sausage, beef jerky, gourmet crackers, pretzels, mustards, team sport novelties in our gift boxes and much more 

 * Our selections are perfect for; Snacks, gifts, corporate gifts, gifts for him, gifts for dad, gifts for her, gifts for mom, holiday gifts, gifts for men, gifts for women, gifts for grandparents and so much more 

 * Wisconsin’s Best and Wisconsin Cheese Company prides itself on providing USA products, employing hard working Midwest people who allow the entire country east to west coast the opportunity to enjoy our quality snacks and gifts
feature_bullets: NATIONALLY KNOWN WISCONSIN’S BEST and WISCONSIN CHEESE COMPANY'S, Ultimate Gift, Naturally Smoked Summer Sausage, Cheese and Much More Gift to Send.

READY TO SERVE – All of our Value Gourmet Cheese and Sausage Gift Baskets, Gift Boxes and Single Products are ready to serve and only require refrigeration after opening | Each unique gift is Hand Packed with quality and care | MADE IN THE USA

GIFT IDEAS – Perfect for Every Holiday Gift Basket or Personal Event, Birthday Gift, Food Gift, Thank You or Appreciation, Get Well, Graduation, Anniversary, Congratulations, Friendship, Summer, New Home and for Gift Giving Holidays; Christmas, Thanksgiving, Easter, Labor Day, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Memorial Day, Veterans Day, 4th of July and others
EASY TO SEND – Delivered from your online order by Amazon |Fast and Easy Delivery to your Home or sent as a Gift | Free Shipping with Amazon Prime | Can ship to APO's
Nationally Known Wisconsin's Best and Wisconsin Cheese Company Quality Gift Assortments and Samplers

specifications.Manufacturer: WISCONSIN'S BEST, LLC and WISCONSIN CHEESE COMPANY
